Class SentencePair

  • java.lang.Object
    • SentencePair

  • public class SentencePair
extends java.lang.Object
    SentencePair contains a Pair of the class Sentence: one czech and a corresponding english sentence

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Sentence czech 
      (package private) Sentence english 
      (package private) java.lang.String outputFile 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SentencePair(Sentence english, Sentence czech, java.lang.String outputFile) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkVerbCorrespondences()
      the method is called for each english-czech sentence pair (which has fields full sentence and verb list) the verbs from the czech verb list are looked up in the VallexGlosbe combined dictionary -> aspect and set of meanings in english the list of verbs from the english sentence is compared to the list of english translations for the czech verb when correspondence is found, both verbs (token and infinitiv), the vallex aspect and both sentences are written to a file
      boolean isMaybeReflexive() 
      boolean isMaybeReflexiveDative() 
      VallexGlosbeVerb lookupVerb(java.lang.String infinitiv)
      Looks up the verb in the VallexGlosbeDictionary; expanded with lookups for reflexives (Accusative and Dative)
      java.lang.String toString() 
      void writeSentences(java.lang.String[] dataToWrite) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

      • checkVerbCorrespondences

        public void checkVerbCorrespondences()
        the method is called for each english-czech sentence pair (which has fields full sentence and verb list) the verbs from the czech verb list are looked up in the VallexGlosbe combined dictionary -> aspect and set of meanings in english the list of verbs from the english sentence is compared to the list of english translations for the czech verb when correspondence is found, both verbs (token and infinitiv), the vallex aspect and both sentences are written to a file

      • writeSentences

        public void writeSentences(java.lang.String[] dataToWrite)

        public VallexGlosbeVerb lookupVerb(java.lang.String infinitiv)
        Looks up the verb in the VallexGlosbeDictionary; expanded with lookups for reflexives (Accusative and Dative)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
